security: Granting access to classified records, even for background use, can expose sensitive information. Citing 'CL REASON 1.5(c)' indicates the material involves classified national security information.
summary: J. Barry Harrelson requests a temporary Byeman clearance for Kathryn Michelle Combs, an Assassination Records Review Board (ARRB) staff member, to access specific U-2 project records responsive to a special search request from the JFK Board.
summary_one_paragraph: On May 16, 1997, J. Barry Harrelson of CSI/HRG sent a memorandum to Roger Martin requesting a temporary Byeman clearance for Kathryn Michelle Combs, an employee of the Assassination Records Review Board (ARRB), to access specific records pertaining to the U-2 project. This request was made in response to a special search from the JFK Board. Marsha Hubbs from DS&T IMO reviewed the files and approved Combs' access for background use only.
title: Special Clearance for ARRB Staff
